casebody.data:
THE LEHIGH. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 20, 1922.) No. 206. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Libel in admiralty by the Lehigh Coal & Navigation Company against the steam tug Lehigh, of which the Lehigh Valley Transportation Company was claimant. Decree for respondent, and libel-ant appeals. Affirmed. Duncan & Mount, Stephen C. Fordham, and Henry W. Nichols, 3d, all of New York City, for appellant. Harrington, Bigham & Jinglar, L. J. Matteson, and C. W. Hagen, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
